5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: (Sahl) bin Hunaif said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever purifies himself in his house, then comes to the Quba’ Mosque and offers one prayer therein, will have a reward like that for ‘Umrah.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ قُبَاءٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer in Quba’ Mosque
